Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I thought I was prepared to become a
queen, but now that it is actually coming
to pass...I am in disbelief.
At the very least, I must strive very hard
to ensure that I do not embarrass myself!

<snd:Chat_00>To start, I shall prepare my dear Sidon's
throne. I hear the Exalted Dorephan will
be returning to his palace as well.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>In time, and little by little, I will perhaps
become used to this new position of mine.<sp:5:0:0>
I already have much to do!
I intend to prepare Sidon's throne for him.<sp:5:1:0>
Ah, and I must make arrangements for
the Exalted Dorephan's new abode.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>I finally had the opportunity to have a
meaningful conversation with my
dear Sidon.
Ever since the sludge started falling,
we simply could not manage the time
for it, as much we both needed it.
Once all of these strange phenomena are
taken care of, <sp:5:1:0>he and I will be able to have
many more important conversations.
<sp:3:0:2:0d01><snd:Happy_00>I am certain that his sweet sister, Mipha,
is looking down on us, through our
struggles as well as our triumphs.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:LaughS>From here on out, I shall make it a point
to always keep the lines of communication
open with my dear Sidon.
It is my duty as a queen and as his
adoring wife!
Comment_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_01>Oh? Could it be that you already have
an ancient arowana?
Comment_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_00>Link!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you ever so much for saving
the domain!

Oh, that reminds me. I can finally give you
your precious <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>, which is once
again as good as new.
Comment_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>It is about an item of yours that you
entrusted the domain with repairingâ€”
your <clr:0000>Zora armor<clr:ffff>!
The repair is mostly complete, but it does
require just one more thing...

I need a fish called an <clr:0000>ancient arowana<clr:ffff>.


<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I can finish the armor right away if I can
somehow acquire a scale from that fish.

We have not seen <clr:0000>ancient arowanas<clr:ffff>
around lately, <sp:5:0:0>and I have no idea where
they can be found.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>If you locate one, Sir Link, please bring it
to me.

Do so, and I shall fix your precious item
at once and return it to your care!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>As you well know, the <clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>allows
even a Hylian like you to climb waterfalls
with ease.
I am certain that such a skill will aid you
on your journey, so please do not forget!
Comment_17:

armor<clr:ffff>, I must acquire a fish called an

<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you locate one, Sir Link, could you

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Do so, and I shall fix your precious item

As you well know, the Zora armor allows

I am certain that such a skill will aid you

Comment_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Sir Link! <sp:5:0:0>Thank you ever so much for
saving the domain. You are everything
that Sidon claimed you to be.
Though this is hardly sufficient remittance
for the debt we owe, know that your <clr:0000>Zora
armor <clr:ffff>is nearly repaired.
As you well know, the Zora armor allows
even a Hylian like you to <clr:0000>climb waterfalls<clr:ffff>
with ease.
I am certain that such a skill will prove
useful to you, Sir Link.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>The only trouble is that I cannot find an
<clr:0000>ancient arowana<clr:ffff>, the last thing I need to
finish the repair. I am at a standstill.
We have not seen them here recently, and
I have no idea where they can be found.

I must find a way to acquire an <clr:0000>ancient
arowana <clr:ffff>as soon as possible...<sp:5:0:0>
Comment_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0d01>Please, take this.


<snd:Ease_01>I am so happy that I was able to repair it
for you. It is a precious piece of armor,
after all.
As you well know, that Zora armor allows
you to climb waterfalls with the ease of
us Zora.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Ease_00>I hope that this will aid in you your
search for Princess Zelda!
Comment_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Link!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you ever so much for saving
the domain!

As it were, there is something that I would
like to speak with you about, if you have a
moment to spare.
